description: The fabric used for the Alta collection, is a pile quality made with 80% merino wool, knitted with a shearling look. We have made a full zipped vest for men which can be worn over your ski pants for apres ski, or as a warming layer for all outdoor activity. The vest is trimmed with a water repellent fabric for details. Both front pockets are zipped, as well as the chest pocket. The second chest pocket closes with snap buttons.
name: We Norwegians Alta Vest - Mens
